name: Descent (kapo.dev)
description:
This game was for the WOWIE game jam by 1 person, me

In this game, you have to try to complete the level that the AI made for you,  to help you achieve this you have a double jump. To increase the replay value a timer is added for you to try and complete the level as fast as you can, to help you do that whilst holding S in the air you will fall faster.

Controls:

A & D - Move left and right.

Space - jump or if pressed in the air a second jump.

S - if held in the air you will fall faster.

Thank hope you will have fun. If you have any feedback please comment on it!
